  message(FATAL_ERROR "GainPlugIn_jucer_FILE must be defined")
endif()

  "${GainPlugIn_jucer_FILE}" ABSOLUTE
  BASE_DIR "${CMAKE_BINARY_DIR}"
)

  PROJECT_FILE "${GainPlugIn_jucer_FILE}"

)
